text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-Dentition where concept is-a PermanentDentition

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-Dentition
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    PermanentDentitionPermanent dentitionPermanent dentition, the natural teeth of adulthood that replace or are added to the deciduous teeth

name: PermanentDentition
title: PermanentDentition
description: Permanent dentition, the natural teeth of adulthood that replace or are added to the deciduous teeth
